description: Remove tag(s) from an existing indicator record.

inputs.description: Specifies the indicator which the tag will be removed from. Supports a string indicator value or an indicator id.
inputs.name: indicator

inputs.description: Comma separated list of tags. Tags should only contain characters Aa-Zz, 0-9, '-', and '_'.
inputs.name: tags

outputs.description: The indicator id that was changed.
The remaining tags on the indicator after the modification.
